questions.title: What would you like to do?

items.text: Learn how neural networks work and how to code them
Deep-dive into a specific area of AI
Kick-off, or support, an AI project in my company
Played around with code found online

questions.title: Are you or members of your team from an under-represented background within AI?

addendums.html:
Our commitment to diversity

We've established our scholarships to help bring more people into the AI industry; in particular those people who are from under-represtened backgrounds, or people who have faced barriers gaining entry into the field. Please feel free to apply!

Our commitment to diversity

We've established our scholarships to help bring more people into the AI industry; in particular those people who are from under-represtened backgrounds, or people who have faced barriers gaining entry into the field.

If you're unsure if you fit into this category, please apply anyway, and we will be in contact with you.

results.html:
Join us for our Leadership Workshop!

Our leadership workshop is aimed at people who planning on kicking off AI projects in their companies. We focus on practical advice, tips and tricks from our experience in industry, and a pragmatic framework to help embed AI in your business-as-usual workflows.

Consulting to build capability

We'd be happy to work with you and your team to get a project started. Our preference is to support your team in building and establishing an AI practice, but we're also happy to undertake special projects, if they overlap with our skills. Find out more about what we can do via our custom workshop page, or just get in contact!

Join us for an event!

We frequently run, and attend, events related to AI. You can find the full list over on our community & events page. You can also find out what's happening by joining our newsletter, at the bottom of the page.

... are you sure?

Our technical deep learning workshop covers the essential details. You can read move of the details on the page itself.

If you're interested in a more focused area of deep learning, you might consider our custom workshops for you and your team.

Brave!

Interesting that you want to dive in without even knowing at AI is! Feel free to join us at an event :) or check out our deep learning showreel to see what's possible!

Brave!

Interesting that you want to dive in without even knowing at AI is! Feel free to join us at an event :) or check out our deep learning showreel to see what's possible!

Join us at our next Technical Deep Learhing Workshop, ...
or design a specialised one!

Our technical deep learning workshop is based in TensorFlow, and designed for programmers and data scientists. We cover all the aspects of building a deep learning model from scratch, going over some key ideas in the theory of deep learning, all in an highly personalised and targetted teaching environment of at most five attendees per session.

As you're interested in bringing your team, it might be very useful to design a focused workshop for your particular set of problems. Please reach out to discuss!

Design a custom workshop with us!

We would love to work with you to design a custom workshop for you, focused around your environment, problem space, and data ecosystem. Please reach out to discuss!

Design a custom workshop with us!

We would love to work with you to design a custom workshop for you, focused around your environment, problem space, and data ecosystem. Please reach out to discuss!

Let's build something together!

We love collaborating. We'd love to hear what you have in mind. We're open to working on some consulting projects together, or doing open-source/public work, demonstrating AI to the public.

Get in contact and let's chat more!
